channel.title: Need help with VPS
channel.description:
Alright, well I do not know if this is the right section so if it isn't I would appreciate a mod moving it to the appropriate section, I purchased a VPS last night, it is a Linux x64 OS, and to access it I have a built in console where i can upload files etc, when I try to compress my source into a RAR it will say when i try to upload it "Not allowed in prolog" or somthing similar, this is my first time running a VPS and I dont even know what to do after I upload the files, if someone could help me out it would be very much appreciated, and asap would be great. Also i have contacted customer support and they said they have no say over that seeing as they are a self managed vps, but the person said try compressing it into a .ta.gz file, I have also tried this and it still says the same thing, Could someone please help me out? my VPS is : www.Hwshosting.net
Regards, Schitzomniac (MicroFire Development team: Mod Steven)

item.title: Need help with VPS
item.dc:creator: @Schitzomniac Schitzomniac
item.description:
@Schitzomniac wrote:

BUMP…
oh, and does anybody have any advice for me on what to do, because i am currently stumped on what i should do, i just want to ensure my server is up 24/7 so that i can have steady players and currently my host is garbage, so someone PLEASE HELP

Read full topic

item.description:
